blocks.text: A threat actor is any individual, group, or organization that intentionally attempts to exploit vulnerabilities to gain unauthorized access to systems or data.
Threat actors differ in skill level, resources, objectives, and persistence. Understanding who is likely to target an organization helps determine which defenses are most important.
Some attackers operate opportunistically, scanning the internet for exposed services, while others perform long-term reconnaissance against specific targets.
